overview: A radical student is adopted by a group of young New Yorkers, serves as a catalyst to alter his and their lives. Gathering in a Manhattan apartment, the group of friends meet to discuss social mobility, Fourier's socialism and play bridge in their cocoon of upper-class society - until they are joined by a man with a critical view of their way of life.
tagline: Finally... A film about the downwardly mobile.
cast: Edward Clements|Chris Eigeman|Taylor Nichols|Carolyn Farina|Isabel Gillies
